modName: Tutorial - Creating a new animated tree model
summary: This is a tutorial in order to help the creation of new animated trees for Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Hello,

For my personnal mod, I needed trees and did not find any mod with the targeted models, or any tutorial explaining how to create one.

After several weeks of work, the first trees start to grow in this mod and I wanted to share how to do this.

So enjoy!

Note that this tutorial is base on the simple tree model as treeaspen04.nif which does not gives the best animation.
The decoding work has also been made with the other tree structure with skeleton (treeaspen01 for example), more work is needed in order to offer a 3D ressource file and the related explanation in order to use it, so this will be done in a second step.

Hope this will help!
Feel free to use it!
author: baronf
